name: OpenPop
description:
Description

Explore a medieval fantasy world in which you take role of nation commander that is trying to reclaim their land. Fight across countless battlefields in order to get your nation back to its former glory.

Features
  • Up to 4 team battlefield
  • Various troop types
  • Simple RTS with no resource gathering
Controls
  • WASD to move camera around
  • QE to move camera up and down
  • F5 to hide UI
  • F6 to enable free camera controls
  • With selected building from [Build]
    • Left click to stop placing buildings
    • Right click to place building
  • Delete placed buildings by selecting them under [Destroy] tab
